Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a small flat base, slightly restricted base and simple lip. The surface has been polished but does not bear a slip. Its colour varies from red to dark beige outside and from black to beige inside. The base is slightly curved and the lip is uneven.
